citationDetail: Viovy, N., P. Ciais (2009), A combined dataset for ecosystem modelling.
title: A combined dataset for ecosystem modelling

url.description: CRU-NCEP is a forcing dataset in which NCEP reanalysis data are bias corrected using the gridded in situ climate data from the Climate Reserach Unit (CRU).
url.name: A combined dataset for ecosystem modelling

abstract: CRU-NCEP is a forcing dataset in which NCEP reanalysis data are bias corrected using the gridded in situ climate data form the Climate Reserach Unit (CRU).
